subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer stayed on track to meet in another final by winning their quarterfinals at the Madrid Masters. The top-ranked Nadal downed Feliciano López, 6-4, 6-4, and the second-ranked Federer eliminated ninth-seeded Juan Martín del Potro, 6-3, 6-3. In Saturday’s semifinals, Nadal will meet Gilles Simon. Federer will face fourth-seeded Andy Murray. ¶Venus Williams beat Francesca Schiavone, 6-3, 6-3, in the quarterfinals of the Zurich Open. Williams, seeded third, next faces second-seeded Ana Ivanovic, who defeated Petra Kvitova, 6-1, 6-4. Flavia Pennetta and Anabel Medina Garrigues will also meet in the semifinals. zurich (AP).
